landing.title: Transform Your Podcasts into
landing.description: Upload your audio files and get instant transcriptions and AI-generated summaries. Perfect for content creators, researchers, and podcasters.
landing.howItWorksDescription: Three simple steps to get your transcriptions and summaries
landing.step1Description: Upload your audio file (MP3, WAV, M4A, etc.) up to 300MB. We support most audio formats.
landing.step2Description: Our AI transcribes your audio using Whisper and generates intelligent summaries.
landing.step3Description: Download your transcription, read the AI summary, and share with your team.
landing.whyChooseDescription: Everything you need to transform audio into actionable content
landing.feature1Description: Get transcriptions in minutes, not hours. Powered by OpenAI's Whisper API.
landing.feature2Description: State-of-the-art AI ensures accurate transcriptions even with background noise.
landing.feature3Description: Get intelligent summaries that highlight key points and insights.
landing.feature4Description: Support for files up to 300MB with chunked upload technology.
landing.feature5Description: Export transcriptions as TXT, SRT, or VTT. Download summaries as PDF.
landing.feature6Description: Your audio files are processed securely and deleted after 7 days.
landing.pricingDescription: Choose the plan that fits your needs
landing.faq1Answer: We support MP3, WAV, M4A, OGG, FLAC, and most common audio formats. Maximum file size is 300MB.
landing.faq2Answer: Transcription typically takes 1-2 minutes per 10 minutes of audio, depending on file size and server load.
landing.faq3Question: How are my audio files stored?
landing.faq3Answer: Audio files are stored securely and automatically deleted after 7 days. Transcripts and summaries are kept indefinitely.
landing.faq4Answer: Yes! You can export transcriptions as TXT, SRT (subtitles), or VTT formats. Summaries can be downloaded as PDF.

landing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of content creators who use PodBrief to turn their audio into actionable insights.

about.title: About PodBrief
about.description: We're on a mission to make audio transcription and analysis accessible to everyone.
about.missionDescription: To empower content creators, researchers, and professionals with cutting-edge AI technology that transforms audio content into actionable insights. We believe that every voice deserves to be heard and understood.
about.valuesDescription: We're committed to accuracy, privacy, and user experience. Your content is yours, and we're here to help you unlock its potential while keeping your data secure and private.
about.whyChooseDescription: Powerful features designed for modern content creators
about.aiPoweredDescription: Leveraging OpenAI's Whisper and GPT models for the most accurate transcriptions and intelligent summaries available.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: PodBrief ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Name and email address (via authentication provider)
Profile information (name, profile picture)
Payment information (processed securely through Stripe)

audioFiles.title: 2.2 Audio Files
audioFiles.description: When you upload audio files for transcription:
items: Files are stored temporarily on our servers
Files are processed using OpenAI's Whisper API
Files may be deleted after processing or after a retention period

usageData.title: 2.3 Usage Data
usageData.description: We automatically collect information about how you use our service, including:
items: Transcription history and usage patterns
Credit purchases and consumption
Device and browser information

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transcriptions and generate summaries
Process payments and manage your account
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: Service Providers: We use OpenAI to process transcriptions. Audio files are sent to OpenAI's servers for processing.
Payment Processing: We use Stripe to process payments. Payment information is handled by Stripe and not stored on our servers.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Access and update your personal information through your account settings
Delete your account and associated data
Request a copy of your data
Opt out of certain communications

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Audio files may be deleted after processing or after a retention period. You can delete your account and associated data at any time.

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changesToPolicy.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using PodBrief ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use our Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: PodBrief provides AI-powered audio transcription and summarization services. We use OpenAI's Whisper and GPT models to transcribe audio files and generate summaries, keywords, and insights.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.description: To use our Service, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
All activities that occur under your account
Providing accurate and complete information
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

creditSystem.title: 4.1 Credit System
creditSystem.content: Our Service operates on a credit-based system. Credits are purchased in advance and used to transcribe audio files. One credit equals one minute of transcription.

paymentTerms.title: 4.2 Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. By making a purchase, you agree to Stripe's terms of service. Prices are displayed in USD and are subject to change.

refunds.title: 4.3 Refunds
refunds.content: Credits are non-refundable but never expire. You can use purchased credits at any time. If you experience technical issues, please contact support for assistance.

acceptableUse.title: 5. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: You agree not to use the Service to:
items: Upload content that is illegal, harmful, or violates any laws
Upload content that infringes on intellectual property rights
Upload content containing malware, viruses, or harmful code
Attempt to reverse engineer or compromise the Service
Use the Service for any unauthorized commercial purposes

contentOwnership.title: 6. Content Ownership
contentOwnership.content: You retain all ownership rights to the audio files you upload and the transcriptions generated from them. By using our Service, you grant us a limited license to process your files solely for the purpose of providing transcription services.

serviceAvailability.title: 7. Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: We strive to provide reliable service but do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation. The Service may be unavailable due to maintenance, technical issues, or circumstances beyond our control.

accuracyDisclaimer.title: 8. Accuracy Disclaimer
accuracyDisclaimer.content: While we use industry-leading AI technology, transcriptions may contain errors, especially with poor audio quality, accents, or specialized terminology. We recommend reviewing and editing transcriptions for accuracy.

limitationLiability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, PodBrief shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these Terms or for any other reason. You may delete your account at any time through your account settings.

changesToTerms.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the Service. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

contactInformation.title: 13. Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at
